title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.5 - Authority for representation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.5 - Authority for representation

State Regulations

Any person appearing before the Authority in a
representative capacity may be required to show his authority to act in such
capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
52.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
